title: Building a RAG-Powered PDF Chatbot with Helicone Integration
title1: Building a RAG-Powered PDF Chatbot with Helicone Integration
title2: Building a RAG-Powered PDF Chatbot with Helicone Integration
description: Learn how to build a Retrieve-and-Generate (RAG) chatbot that can intelligently interact with PDF documents, enhanced with Helicone for better monitoring and logging capabilities.
author: Kavin Desi
